message: Hi Bob, I'm Alice. I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it will be of great value to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. How about $13,000?  This would give me a good price while still allowing you to make a profit.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to make this work for both of us. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
